award_title: Quantum Heterostructures of Rhodates and Iridates with Tunable Electron-Correlation and Spin-Orbit Interactions
subject: Sharing spectroscopy data from quantum heterostructures
body:
Hi Professor Seo,

I came across your NSF work on stacking rhodium and iridium oxides to unlock new quantum properties. Sounds like you're using a bunch of advanced spectroscopy techniques—RAMAN, X-ray scattering—to understand what's happening at those interfaces.

I'm building Ouro, a platform for sharing computational tools and datasets in a way that actually works, not just scattered files.

Would be curious if this could help your group.

Best,
